title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description:
Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator tool
2. Select both P1 and P2

Observed Behavior:
Notice that the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' option is not.

Expected Behavior:
Either both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' should be available or neither should be enabled.

Additional Notes:
